com.saic.uicds.core.em.service

Interface ResourceManagementService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResourceManagementServiceImpl

    @Transactional
public interface ResourceManagementService
    The ResourceManagementService uses the CommunicationsService to send EDXL-DE messages to ResourceInstances on other cores. It manages RequestResource and CommitResource work products and creates a Digest for each of these work products. Incoming EDXL-DE messages are passed to the NotificationService for delivery.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roger
